channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-14236] CTAS with UNION ALL puts the wrong stats in Tez
item.description: to repo. in Tez, create table t as select * from src union all select * from src;
item.summary: CTAS with UNION ALL puts the wrong stats in Tez

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
